name: py-neo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Neo is a package for representing electrophysiology data in Python,
together with support for reading a wide range of neurophysiology file
formats

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.

dependencies.name: py-quantities
dependencies.description: Support for physical quantities with units, based on numpy

dependent_to.name: py-pynn
dependent_to.description:
A Python package for simulator-independent specification of neuronal
network models

dependent_to.name: py-elephant
dependent_to.description: Elephant is a package for analysis of electrophysiology data in Python
